entry.title: Stealth Addresses
entry.summary: The context discusses the idea of using the payment protocol to avoid the reuse of addresses, eliminating the need for stealth addresses. The suggestion is made to upload a payment protocol file once and encode a regular bitcoin URI into a QR code on a billboard or attach it to an email for easy payment. The focus is on making the exchange of payment information a one-time event, rather than constantly refreshing it.
